queries.description: CTE with literal selection and filter
queries.sql: WITH CTE_1 AS (SELECT 'a' AS val FROM {mytable} GROUP BY val) SELECT 1 FROM CTE_1 WHERE val >= 'a' AND val < 'b'

queries.description: Literal SEARCH filter on subquery with CASE WHEN
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN strCol = 'foo' THEN 'a' ELSE 'b' END AS val FROM {mytable}) WHERE val IN ('a', 'b')
